channel.title: Analytics on Data Automation
channel.description: Recent content in Analytics on Data Automation

item.title: Dealing with differences between testing and analytics dashboards
item.description: The number of visitors or sessions that online testing tools display is different from those shown in analytics tools, even if the test is using 100% of available traffic. Sometimes the difference is so significant that raises the question about which dashboard should be used. How to make that difference manageable?
